newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's UDI bonds real return 6.6 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's UDI bonds real return 6.6 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 1,050-day UDI bonds were assigned at a price of 99.7300 UDIs and a real return of 6.60 percent at the primary auction on Tuesday.
Two weeks ago the 1,050-day UDI bonds had a real return of 6.87 percent.
Demand this week was 1.676 billion UDIs compared to 250 million UDIs on offer from Banco de Mexico with a bid-to-cover ratio of 6.70.
The 1,778-day UDIs were assigned at a price of 99.5800 UDIs and a real return of 6.60 percent.
Two weeks ago the 1,778-day UDI bonds had a real return of 6.90 percent.
Demand this week was 1.597 billion UDIs compared to 250 million UDIs on offer from Banco de Mexico with a bid-to-cover ratio of 6.388.
The daily value of the UDI can be found on MXAAN.
